description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Minamiboso, Japan. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Japan Coastal Escape 90 Minutes from Tokyo with Onsen Baths & Spa
hotels.description: Discover the coastal charm of Japan's Chiba Prefecture with a stay at the Grand Mercure Minamiboso Resort & Spa. This haven provides the perfect base for exploring the region's beaches, colourful flower fields and the historic Nojimazaki Lighthouse. Each stylish room offers views of the Pacific Ocean or the lush greenery of the Boso Peninsula. Savour local delicacies at Le Sensoriel restaurant, where expert chefs craft exquisite dishes using the freshest regional ingredients. The hotel's sophisticated bar beckons with its carefully curated selection of Japanese whiskies and sake, while the outdoor pool and traditional onsen spa offer tranquil spaces for relaxation and rejuvenation.

seo.title: Hotel a Minamiboso - Japan Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Minamiboso, Japan con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
